name: Montana Spicy Bison Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Kick off game day with a touchdown-worthy dip, loaded with ground bison meat, tomatoes and cheese. Bring it all together with the heat of McCormick® Hot Chili Seasoning Mix. Garnish with sour cream and peppers, and get the snacking started with tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1 (1.25 ounce) package McCormick® Hot Chili Seasoning Mix
1 (8 ounce) package processed cheese food (such as Velveeta ®), cut into cubes
directions: Brown meat and onion in large skillet on medium-high heat, about 5 minutes
Stir in tomatoes and seasoning mix
Reduce heat; cover and simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally
Simmer 5 minutes or until cheese is melted
Top with sour cream and jalapeno
